message.raw:
Added the RelWithDebInfo cmake mode:

 - It will be used to generate the debs packages. Its allows to have
   gazebo and gazebo-dbg packages.

 - It use the -g option while keeping -O2. Its not an option to drop
   optimizations. -NDEBUG is out for the moment so assetions are
   going to be compiled and used. This may be change in the future

message:
